I<S>1473</S> charge<S>1263</S> thee therefore<S>3767</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, who<S>3588</S> shall<S>3195</S> judge<S>2919</S> the quick<S>2198</S> and<S>2532</S> the dead<S>3498</S> at<S>2596</S> his<S>846</S> appearing<S>2015</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> kingdom<S>932</S>;
Preach<S>2784</S> the word<S>3056</S>; be instant<S>2186</S> in season<S>2122</S>, out of season<S>171</S>; reprove<S>1651</S>, rebuke<S>2008</S>, exhort<S>3870</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> longsuffering<S>3115</S> and<S>2532</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the time<S>2540</S> will come<S>2071</S> when<S>3753</S> they will<S>430</S> not<S>3756</S> endure<S>430</S> sound<S>5198</S> doctrine<S>1319</S>; but<S>235</S> after<S>2596</S> their own<S>2398</S> lusts<S>1939</S> shall they heap<S>2002</S> to themselves<S>1438</S> teachers<S>1320</S>, having itching<S>2833</S> ears<S>189</S>;
And<S>2532</S> they shall turn away<S>3303</S> <S>654</S> their ears<S>189</S> from<S>575</S> the truth<S>225</S>, and<S>1161</S> shall be turned<S>1624</S> unto<S>1909</S> fables<S>3454</S>.
But<S>1161</S> watch<S>3525</S> thou<S>4771</S> in<S>1722</S> all things<S>3956</S>, endure afflictions<S>2553</S>, do<S>4160</S> the work<S>2041</S> of an evangelist<S>2099</S>, make full proof<S>4135</S> of thy<S>4675</S> ministry<S>1248</S>. <sup>make: or, fulfil</sup>
For<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>4689</S> now<S>2235</S> ready to be offered<S>4689</S>, and<S>2532</S> the time<S>2540</S> of my<S>1699</S> departure<S>359</S> is at hand<S>2186</S>.
I have fought<S>75</S> a good<S>2570</S> fight<S>73</S>, I have finished<S>5055</S> my course<S>1408</S>, I have kept<S>5083</S> the faith<S>4102</S>:
Henceforth<S>3063</S> there is laid up<S>606</S> for me<S>3427</S> a crown<S>4735</S> of righteousness<S>1343</S>, which<S>3739</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, the righteous<S>1342</S> judge<S>2923</S>, shall give<S>591</S> me<S>3427</S> at<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> day<S>2250</S>: and<S>1161</S> not<S>3756</S> to me<S>1698</S> only<S>3440</S>, but<S>235</S> unto all them<S>3956</S> also<S>2532</S> that love<S>25</S> his<S>846</S> appearing<S>2015</S>.
Do thy diligence<S>4704</S> to come<S>2064</S> shortly<S>5030</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>:
For<S>1063</S> Demas<S>1214</S> hath forsaken<S>1459</S> me<S>3165</S>, having loved<S>25</S> this present<S>3568</S> world<S>165</S>, and<S>2532</S> is departed<S>4198</S> unto<S>1519</S> Thessalonica<S>2332</S>; Crescens<S>2913</S> to<S>1519</S> Galatia<S>1053</S>, Titus<S>5103</S> unto<S>1519</S> Dalmatia<S>1149</S>.
Only<S>3441</S> Luke<S>3065</S> is<S>2076</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>. Take<S>353</S> Mark<S>3138</S>, and bring him<S>71</S> with<S>3326</S> thee<S>4572</S>: for<S>1063</S> he is<S>2076</S> profitable<S>2173</S> to me<S>3427</S> for<S>1519</S> the ministry<S>1248</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Tychicus<S>5190</S> have I sent<S>649</S> to<S>1519</S> Ephesus<S>2181</S>.
The cloke<S>5341</S> that<S>3739</S> I left<S>620</S> at<S>1722</S> Troas<S>5174</S> with<S>3844</S> Carpus<S>2591</S>, when thou comest<S>2064</S>, bring<S>5342</S> with thee, and<S>2532</S> the books<S>975</S>, but especially<S>3122</S> the parchments<S>3200</S>.
Alexander<S>223</S> the coppersmith<S>5471</S> did<S>1731</S> me<S>3427</S> much<S>4183</S> evil<S>2556</S>: the Lord<S>2962</S> reward<S>591</S> him<S>846</S> according to<S>2596</S> his<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S>:
Of whom<S>3739</S> be<S>5442</S> thou<S>4771</S> ware<S>5442</S> also<S>2532</S>; for<S>1063</S> he hath<S>436</S> greatly<S>3029</S> withstood<S>436</S> our<S>2251</S> words<S>3056</S>. <sup>our words: or, our preachings</sup>
At<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> first<S>4413</S> answer<S>627</S> no man<S>3762</S> stood<S>4836</S> with me<S>3427</S>, but<S>235</S> all<S>3956</S> men forsook<S>1459</S> me<S>3165</S>: I pray God that it may<S>3049</S> not<S>3361</S> be laid<S>3049</S> to their charge<S>846</S>.
Notwithstanding<S>1161</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> stood<S>3936</S> with me<S>3427</S>, and<S>2532</S> strengthened<S>1743</S> me<S>3165</S>; that<S>2443</S> by<S>1223</S> me<S>1700</S> the preaching<S>2782</S> might be fully known<S>4135</S>, and<S>2532</S> that all<S>3956</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> might hear<S>191</S>: and<S>2532</S> I was delivered<S>4506</S> out of<S>1537</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of the lion<S>3023</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> shall deliver<S>4506</S> me<S>3165</S> from<S>575</S> every<S>3956</S> evil<S>4190</S> work<S>2041</S>, and<S>2532</S> will preserve<S>4982</S> me unto<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> heavenly<S>2032</S> kingdom<S>932</S>: to whom<S>3739</S> be glory<S>1391</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
Salute<S>782</S> Prisca<S>4251</S> and<S>2532</S> Aquila<S>207</S>, and<S>2532</S> the household<S>3624</S> of Onesiphorus<S>3683</S>.
Erastus<S>2037</S> abode<S>3306</S> at<S>1722</S> Corinth<S>2882</S>: but<S>1161</S> Trophimus<S>5161</S> have I left<S>620</S> at<S>1722</S> Miletum<S>3399</S> sick<S>770</S>.
Do thy diligence<S>4704</S> to come<S>2064</S> before<S>4253</S> winter<S>5494</S>. Eubulus<S>2103</S> greeteth<S>782</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> Pudens<S>4227</S>, and<S>2532</S> Linus<S>3044</S>, and<S>2532</S> Claudia<S>2803</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the brethren<S>80</S>.
The Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> be with<S>3326</S> thy<S>4675</S> spirit<S>4151</S>. Grace<S>5485</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>. Amen<S>281</S>. <sup>The second<S>1208</S> epistle unto<S>4314</S> Timotheus<S>5095</S>, ordained<S>5500</S> the first<S>4413</S> bishop<S>1985</S> of the church<S>1577</S> of the Ephesians<S>2180</S>, was written<S>1125</S> from<S>575</S> Rome<S>4516</S>, when<S>3753</S> Paul<S>3972</S> was brought before<S>3936</S> Nero<S>3505</S> <S>2541</S> the second<S>1537</S> <S>1208</S> time<S>2540</S>.</sup>
